topics.body:
About 9 hours left of 2014 here

I went to some Marvel Experience thing today, I liked it, but I feel like people about 5 years younger/older than me would've enjoyed it more.

And I also ate sushi today. So that's a thing. Also I am actually pretty good with chopsticks, for a beginner anyways. The rest of my family was fumbling about and pretty much gave up and used a fork.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a46f5163687203300c0000#post_54a46f5163687203300c0000
Happy 4000th post

topics.body:
For those of you that don't know what the hell I'm talking about and don't mind a spoiler here's the plot behind Fantasy Kaleidoscope Red Mist Incident's arc:
[spoiler]Remilia tries to block out the sun with clouds so that she can go outside in the day cause she's a vampire and take over the village so that she can have a place to live.  Then she realizes "oh shit; I fucked up about the entire reason I was doing this and abandoned my sister!"  The plot resolution isn't sparkly powers of friendship but rather Remilia realizing "I fucked up and abandoned my sister!"[/spoiler]

"Brother my brother" totally 100% fits.

topics.body:
"@PonyCat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a476b86368727e4f330200#post_54a476b86368727e4f330200
"I LIVE!"



Random news:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/294/857/e0d.gif!
Fantasy Kaleidoscope is doing a Hijiri arc next.

I'm trying to imagine a appropriate analogy but imagine on the hype scale of if you woke up one day and found out that Kamen Rider was coming to basic cable in the west subbed and in it's original japanese voices level hype or if for the next transformers movie they removed michael bay from directing or if they brought back xenosaga levels hype I'm really feeling the hype.
